document_data.name: Tyche Pink
document_data.mainbody: '''Tyche Pink''' was a type of blended [[wine]], found in the [[Western Heartlands]], along the [[River Chionthar]], and the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Tyche Pink owed its color to a mixture of red and white wines, both were very fragrant. This blended wine was considered to be somewhat a low-class libation and nobles of Baldur's Gate only consumed Tyche Pink as a last resort.
